Specifies the URI of the namespace for the patient uuids, this will be set as the value of the system property for the patient uuid identifier, the value MUST match the internalId URL value defined in the OpenCR config file under the systems section.

Comma-separated list of mappings between OpenMRS patient identifier type uuids and system URIs (identifier type namespaces), should be of the form identifierTypeUuid-1^systemUri1,identifierTypeUuid-2^systemUri2. The system URI values MUST match the URI values defined for the respective patient identifier types in the OpenCR config file under the systems section. The system URI for the NID patient identifier type MUST also match the values used in the OpenCR PatientRelationship.json and decisionRules.json files.

Comma-separated list of mappings between OpenMRS patient identifier type uuids and concepts in the terminology system associated to the URI set via the global property named ${project.parent.artifactId}.identifier.type.concept.source.uri, should be of the form identifierTypeUuid-1:conceptCode1:conceptDisplay1,identifierTypeUuid-2:conceptCode2:conceptDisplay2 e.g b6c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:NID:National ID,c6c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:SSN:Social Security Number.
